name: Save new Lexoffice invoices to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
Every time a new invoice is created in lexoffice, a new row with invoice details will be added to a Google Sheet spreadsheet.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11kQbFwP8fl9NNSdqkAkJdT81YawDk65vnIj0vIlUcgM/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for the lexoffice invoice data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
